content.question: For an arithmetic sequence <math alttext="S subscript n"><semantics><msub><mi>S</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math alttext="S subscript 3 equals 3"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>S</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="S subscript 6 equals 24"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>S</mi><mn>6</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>24</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. What is the value of <math alttext="S subscript 10 minus S subscript 8"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>S</mi><mn>10</mn></msub><mo>-</mo><msub><mi>S</mi><mn>8</mn></msub></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?
